summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6065 for the improvement of University Street and Terry Avenue; and certain other streets and avenues, by installing fire hydrants and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 83002, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
